channel.title: Shop Handler
channel.description:
Hey im New to coding so please dont flame. Most of the people here, Im pretty sure know how to fix this.
i added my first shop in Shops.cfg ( Im also working with blank client and source , I believe its "Delta"
i compiled it and it gave me no problems. so when i run server it gave me this problem >> and also when i try to log in it would take me to the screen and say Loading - Please wait and then it would dc me. and when i would try to relog it says account is already logged in.
This is what it Gives me in Run server [tt]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 550 at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:116) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:30)[/tt]
Request Close Please, Problem has been solved :)

item.title: Shop Handler
item.dc:creator: @xhunterzx xhunterzx

@xhunterzx wrote:

alright i got it thanks dude ur awesome No homo

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Handler
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

If you can’t find shop = 49 in shops.cfg, yes. If you can find it, just edit the items that already exist.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xhunterzx xhunterzx
item.description:
@xhunterzx wrote:

found it
} else if (NPCID == 550) { //Range Shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 49; //Range Shop

so for shopid i put 49? soz for taking alot of ur time lol.

item.title: Shop Handler
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Lowe might already exist as a shop, look for NPCID == 550. If it exists look below and see what wanneShop is equal to. That going into shops.cfg and look for that number. You can than edit the items that are in that shop by changing the numbers on that line.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Handler
item.dc:creator: @xhunterzx xhunterzx
item.description:
@xhunterzx wrote:

i changed the maxshops to 600 its working now , omg another problem, i spawned lowe who is 550 but he doesnt have the items in his trade?

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Handler
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You add a condition to the NPC clicking packet.

In client class search for

case 17:

and Under

NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;

Add

if (NPCID == 550) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = whateverNumberYouPutInShops.cfg; }
And of course change whateverNumberYouPutInShops.cfg to the number that you put in shops.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Handler
item.dc:creator: @xhunterzx xhunterzx
item.description:
@xhunterzx wrote:

oh i didnt kno that, but then how will the npc’s id which is lowe be lowe? since im gunna just put a number that it aint.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Handler
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You don’t use the NPC’s ID as the shop ID. You just pick a number that isn’t already used as a shop.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Handler
item.dc:creator: @xhunterzx xhunterzx
item.description:

item.title: Shop Handler
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Okay you can either change the shop ID to something below 101 or change MaxShops value to something higher than 550.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Handler
item.dc:creator: @xhunterzx xhunterzx
item.description:
@xhunterzx wrote:

Line 30 is : loadShops(“shops.cfg”);
Line 116 is: ShopName[ShopID] = token3[1].replaceAll("_", " ");

Also deathchaso i want to thank you for taking time to look at this thread, because most people just say this guy must be stupid if he doesnt kno -__-.

Read full topic

@xhunterzx wrote:

Hey im New to coding so please dont flame. Most of the people here, Im pretty sure know how to fix this.

i added my first shop in Shops.cfg ( Im also working with blank client and source , I believe its “Delta”

i compiled it and it gave me no problems.
so when i run server it gave me this problem >> and also when i try to log in it would take me to the screen and say Loading - Please wait and then it would dc me. and when i would try to relog it says account is already logged in.

[tt]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 550
